app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

developer: Chengdu Fengmingxuan Network Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
BookTok: Fiction Reading App for All Fiction Lovers  
BookTok is an App for fiction reading, dedicated to serving all the fiction lovers!  

We have a variety of themes, including fantasy, martial arts, romance, urban, campus and so much more. Everything that you can think of is all here!  

We update the bookstore every day, releasing new chapters in seconds—it couldn’t be more convenient for readers! We also have various events awaiting you!  

We keep trying and revising, just to be your closest reading companion.  


Key Features  
【Massive Fictions】  
Cover popular online fictions with various lists and fine classification, including male and female sections, selected books, smart recommendations and more!  

【Quality Reading Experience】  
Customize your read with simulated 3D page turning, offline download, font switching, background adjustment and night mode. We present exquisite book covers, neat content layout, and many other delicate designs to ensure a good experience.  

【Personalized Service】  
Choose from various background colors, skins and fonts. Set your personal reader with a simple click.  

【Intelligent Synchronization】  
Reading progress and notes can be intelligently synchronized and saved in your account. No need to worry about changing devices.  


About Auto-Renewable Subscriptions  
Auto-renewable subscriptions in the app include Check-in Coins Packs.  
Billing period**: The Check-in Coins Packs are available on monthly, quarterly and yearly bases.  
Price:  
- Monthly: USD 7 and 13  
- Quarterly: USD 20 and 38  
- Yearly: USD 60 and 98  
Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.  
Renewal: When you subscribe to the Check-in Coins Pack, your subscription will renew automatically. You'll be charged at the start of each billing cycle until you cancel. Subscriptions are automatically charged each period (monthly or other), and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the start of each cycle.  
Cancellation: You may cancel a subscription at any time more than 24 hours before your renewal date.  


 Important Links  
- Privacy Policy: https://staticpage-en.cdreader.com/RU/AppPrivacyPolicy.html?client_proid=193&mt=1

Contact Us  
For questions or advice, please email: SupportRU2@moboreader.com

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.
See it for yourself with CNN’s live video or be in the know quickly with CNN Shorts.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.
Enjoy a 5-minute preview of CNN live. Unlock unlimited viewing, including CNN's original series and documentary collection, CNN, CNN International, and HLN by logging into your TV provider. Stay caught up with video clips, no login necessary.

TAKE A BREAK.
From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.
Listen to top headlines anywhere you go with live audio from CNN, CNN en Español, CNN International and HLN. Hear the week's biggest and most talked-about stories with the "1 Thing" podcast.

• 24/7 global news
• Live coverage
• Exclusive videos
• Original series
• Award-winning films
• Unlimited articles

Basic plan - The basic CNN experience

Introducing the all-new WebNovel – your gateway to thrilling adventures! 

Immerse yourself in a world of captivating novels and embark on unforgettable journeys. We're here to redefine the way you experience online reading: Let's read your adventures.

The library boasts hundreds of thousands of fanfictions, as well as Western fantasy stories where mythical creatures roam and epic quests unfold. Indulge in the allure of Eastern fantasy, with mesmerising tales of wuxia, xianxia, xuanhuan, and more. Lose yourself in the enchantment of fantasy novels that will keep you spellbound from start to finish.

But that's not all—we've got something special for fans of system novels, litRPGs, and progression fantasy. Experience the thrill of leveling up and unlocking new powers alongside your favourite characters as they navigate immersive game-like worlds.

With WebNovel, you have access to a vast library of captivating novels, including our massive collection of hundreds of thousands of fanfics, written by talented authors from around the globe. Our intuitive interface ensures a seamless reading experience, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in every twist and turn.

Start your reading journey today with WebNovel – where every page is an invitation to escape reality and embark on extraordinary quests. Get ready to read your adventures like never before!

Find your voice and share your message with the world.

Multiple book genres await you to explore on WebNovel, from epic fantasies to hundreds of thousands of unique fanfictions.

developer: Dow Jones & Company, Inc., publisher of The Wall Street Journal.
description:
WALL STREET JOURNAL (iOS) 

Download the WSJ App Today

Staying ahead of the competition means staying up to date with the facts. Get the trusted insights, in-depth analysis and real-time updates you need from the WSJ App.

Download the app today and subscribe to receive instant access to WSJ’s unrivaled journalism covering today’s top stories across finance, politics, business, tech, the economy and more. Enjoy exclusive newsletters and videos that dive deeper into the stories that matter.

Key benefits include:

Customizable App Experience 
(+) Follow your your favorite WSJ journalists
(+) Access interactive charts to follow the latest market trends
(+) Create personalized stock watch lists 
(+) Get content relevant to your job title and industry

Award-winning Journalism Delivered To Your Mobile Device
(+) A real-time news feed, curated by WSJ’s award-winning journalists throughout the day
(+) Up to date global coverage on the news that matters 
(+) Access to curated CFO, CIO, and CMO article feeds

Full Access to WSJ, Anywhere, Anytime
(+) Full access to WSJ on any device
(+) Ability to listen to WSJ articles on your commute, hands-free
(+) Offline reading, enabling you to remain informed, wherever you are

Real Time Market News - Never Miss a Critical Development
(+) Up to the minute stock market quotes
(+) Alerts and notifications for breaking news and updates on the stories, companies and industries that matter most to you
(+) Articles relevant to your personalized stock list

The WSJ App provides comprehensive access that will help you better understand and navigate the complexities of today’s financial world. Regardless of your investing experience, download the app to make more sound financial decisions. 

Stay ahead, stay informed – with The Wall Street Journal App.

Explore the Past Like Never Before – Your Ultimate History Companion!

Step into the world of history with the most immersive and interactive history app available! Whether you’re a student, a trivia enthusiast, or just someone who loves the past, our app is designed to make learning history fun, engaging, and deeply informative. From ancient wonders to modern revolutions, this history encyclopedia has it all! Download now and start your journey through time.

Explore history every day with expertly curated insights, deep dives, and timeless knowledge. This history app offers a rich collection of history facts, biographies, and cultural insights, bringing the past to life through engaging storytelling and in-depth analysis.

Daily History & Encyclopedia-Style Learning
• Discover daily history updates, daily facts, today in history and daily random facts about pivotal events, legendary figures, and forgotten stories
• Browse a vast encyclopedia of history, culture, and philosophy, drawing inspiration from Wikipedia, history channel and other apps
• Explore timelines of civilizations, from the ancient world to the medieval era and beyond
• Gain insights from great thinkers like Socrates, Plato, and the Stoics, shaping your understanding of history and thought
• Discover the influence of art history, literature, and philosophy on human civilization

Exclusive History Content & Audio Vault
• Dive into detailed world history lessons covering ancient civilizations, medieval times, and modern events
• Explore art history, famous leaders, groundbreaking inventions, and pivotal wars
• Access a vast encyclopedia of historical knowledge, similar to Wiki, with expertly curated articles
• Listen to history podcasts and curated content similar to history hit and other apps
• Read compelling history stories from around the world, covering everything from Napoleon’s rise to the journeys of Marco Polo

Learn History & National Geographic with AI-Powered Exploration
• Expand your vocabulary and knowledge with learn words and historical terminology explanations
• Connect history with geography by tracing the movements of civilizations, explorers, and empires, paladin and more
• Ask our History AI any question and get instant, well-researched answers
• Chat with historical figures and experience interactive storytelling
• Get personalized recommendations based on your interests, just like a history vault of knowledge!

See real-world map locations of world history events -
• See on Apple Maps real world locations

History Quiz Weekly Series - Test Your Knowledge Every Week
• Every week features 4 themed categories with 10 fresh, curated questions each
• Categories span Wars & Battles, Exploration & Discovery, Science & Technology, Art & Culture, Leaders & Legends, and more
• Learn as you play with instant answer explanations
• Perfect for quick sessions you can finish in minutes, with real learning that sticks.

Whether you’re interested in culture, philosophy, or historical networks, this app provides a gateway to understanding the past. Just for today, start your journey into history.

Subscription / Paid plan details:
• Certain features/content in the app such as AI chat, maps, audio podcast, viewing complete event details require premium subscription
• Premium access is available as a monthly or yearly auto-renewable subscription to unlock full content and features within the app
• Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account after any applicable trial period unless canceled at least 24 hours before the trial concludes
• Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
• You can manage or cancel your subscription anytime in your App Store account settings

Privacy Policy - https://exploredays.app/privacy.html
Disclaimer - https://exploredays.app/disclaimer.html

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Stay informed with the latest updates from Hindustan Times, India’s premier source for reliable news. With over 100 years of exemplary journalism since 1924, we bring you the fastest breaking news and comprehensive coverage on politics, business, entertainment, sports, and more. Whether you're looking for live updates or in-depth analysis, our platform offers a truly immersive reading experience.

Why choose Hindustan Times? Our blend of editorial excellence and comprehensive coverage makes us the best news app in India. Our team of award-winning reporters and editors work tirelessly to provide unbiased, fact-checked reporting, ensuring you receive accurate news from the frontlines. With a personalized news feed based on your reading preferences, discover the content you care about, from live news to insightful columns and analysis.

- Politics & Governance: Stay updated on Parliament sessions, state elections, and policy changes.
- National News: Access breaking news stories from all 28 states and 8 Union Territories.
- World News: Understand international affairs, including US-India relations and global conflicts.
- Business & Economy: Stay ahead with updates on stock markets, startups, and personal finance tips.
- Technology: Discover the latest in AI, gadgets, and cybersecurity developments.
- Sports: Follow cricket (IPL, international), football, and Olympic events closely.
- Entertainment: Get the latest buzz on Bollywood, Hollywood, and OTT platforms.
- Lifestyle: Explore articles on health, travel, food, and much more.

- Ad-free Experience: Premium users enjoy reading without any interruptions.

- Minimal Data Consumption: Fast loading times even with limited bandwidth.

Trust our legacy of over a century in delivering quality journalism. With a team known for investigative excellence, we combat misinformation and deliver verified news. Each article is crafted with integrity to uphold our commitment to unbiased reporting.

Our continued success and credibility stem from our rich heritage and global recognition in journalism. Explore the app to see why thousands trust Hindustan Times for their daily news updates. 

Download now and experience the robust features and trusted journalism that makes Hindustan Times the best news app in India. Stay connected to the stories that matter most.

Discover the joy of reading with Magibook - the app that changes books to match your reading level. Perfect for beginners, English learners, parents, children, and anyone who wants to enjoy books more easily.

What Magibook Offers:

•Makes Books Easier: Every book comes in four reading levels.
•Lots of Books: Read many different books, from philosophy to literary classics.
•Helps You Learn English: Great for ESL, EFL, IELTS, and TOEFL
•Good for Kids: Many valuable books can now readable by children.
•Special features for dyslexia, ADHD, and other reading challenges
•Easy-to-Use Dictionary: Learn new words as you read.
•See Your Progress: Watch how your reading gets better over time. 

For English Learners: 
Improve your English through reading. Start easy and progress to harder books. Boost vocabulary, grammar, and comprehension with famous books in simpler language. Great for IELTS and TOEFL preparation.

For Parents: 
Help your children love reading with age-appropriate books that grow with them. Improve literacy and develop a lifelong passion for literature.

For Everyone: 
We make difficult books simpler, so everyone can enjoy great literature regardless of reading challenges. Perfect for those with dyslexia or ADHD.

Why Choose Magibook?

•Personalized reading experience
•Encourages lifelong reading habits
•Improves English skills for ESL/EFL learners
•Supports special education needs
•Makes classic literature accessible
•Aids in exam preparation
•Provides graded readers for improvement
•Offers abridged versions of complex texts
•Enhances vocabulary and grammar
•Improves reading comprehension and speed 

Available Books: Magibook offers a wide range of famous books at different reading levels, including:

"Don Quixote" by Miguel de Cervantes, "War and Peace" by Leo Tolstoy, "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen, "Les Miserables" by Victor Hugo, "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald, "Crime and Punishment" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "Moby Dick" by Herman Melville, "The Republic" by Plato, "Wealth of Nations" by Adam Smith, "The Ethics of Aristotle" by Aristotle, "Jane Eyre" by Charlotte Brontë, "Ulysses" by James Joyce, "Great Expectations" by Charles Dickens, "The Brothers Karamazov" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin" by Benjamin Franklin, "On Liberty" by John Stuart Mill, "The Count of Monte Cristo" by Alexandre Dumas, "Meditations" by Marcus Aurelius, "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes" by Arthur Conan Doyle, "Kim" by Rudyard Kipling.

From philosophy to adventures, from romances to mysteries, Magibook brings you the best books in a way you can enjoy.

With Magibook, you can:

•Read classic novels at your level
•Improve English vocabulary and grammar
•Prepare for language tests
•Help children develop reading skills
•Make reading easier with dyslexia or ADHD
•Explore philosophy and complex ideas
•Enjoy literature in simplified English
•Track reading progress

app_name: The New York Review of Books
description:
Since 1963, The New York Review of Books has been the place where the world’s leading authors, scientists, educators, artists, and political leaders turn when they wish to engage in a spirited debate on literature, politics, art, and ideas with a small but influential audience that welcomes the challenge. Each issue addresses some of the most passionate political and cultural controversies of the day and reviews the most engrossing new books and the ideas that illuminate them.

The print edition of The New York Review of Books, included in the app, is published 20 times a year. The app also includes all of our online-only content. Articles can be bookmarked for later reading, and the app includes a link to browse our shop, The Reader’s Catalog.

Current print and online-only subscribers receive full access to the app through existing website login credentials (email and password). The app may also be purchased directly through the app store. Purchases made through the app store do not include access to The Review’s website and complete archive.

SUBSCRIBERS’ AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL FEATURE:
Your subscription will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your iTunes account will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal, as stated above, within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.

Current subscriptions may not be cancelled during the active subscription period, but you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Launched in January 2003, Open Source For You is a complete magazine on open source, and is today a big hit with those who love FOSS (Free and Open Source Software). The magazine carries tech articles on Linux and open source for newbies, administrators, developers and fans of open source. Its main objective, however, is to help organisations enhance their return on investment (RoI) by deploying Linux (or open source) solutions.

Most people rely on social media for news, which conforms to their biases and even gives outright fake news. Single publishers report facts, but no outlet is free from bias. To solve this, we built Drooid.

Drooid collects news articles from many reputable sources and gives short summaries from all sides, so you see the full picture faster. With In-Depth AI analysis, you get a clear view of what happened, why it matters, and how different outlets cover it.
On Drooid, you’re not just a passive reader; you can comment, share how you feel, and add context to the news. Your comments help the community understand the news better. Every comment appears in a community feed. With community, you can understand how people are feeling about the news; here, the news becomes more humane, rather than just some facts and statistics.

For full transparency, every summary links back to the original articles. That makes it easy to read original articles and share them right from the app. It serves two things: the readers get to know where the information is coming from, and the publishers get the traffic.

HOW DROOID WORKS
Collects articles from different reputable publishers and outlets
Uses AI to generate concise summaries that cover all sides
Adds additional historical context when it improves understanding
Attaches citations to each summary and links to sources
Gives you In-Depth news analysis with AI from multiple articles

WHAT YOU CAN DO
Read short summaries that present multiple perspectives
Access original articles
Read In-Depth AI news Analysis
Follow people and topics to tailor your feed
Post, comment, and share your take
Search across people, topics, and events
Save stories for later
Be a part of the community

Terms of Use:https://drooid.social/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy:https://drooid.social/privacy

Drooid is built for readers who want sources, context, and room to contribute. If you prefer to verify claims, compare coverage, and see how different outlets frame the same event, Drooid is built for you. Download Drooid to get the complete picture faster.

Craft - Music Learning & Creation Craft is an intuitive music learning app designed for beginners and music enthusiasts. Explore virtual instruments, develop your rhythm skills, and compose original melodies. Key Features: Instrument Studio Play six virtual instruments including Piano, Drums, Guitar, Xylophone, Marimba, and Bells. Each instrument features authentic sound synthesis and responsive touch controls. Song Composer Create original compositions with an intuitive note-by-note interface. Select your instrument, add notes to build melodies, and save your musical creations. Rhythm Challenge Improve your timing and rhythm skills through interactive challenges. Follow visual patterns and tap along to develop your musical sense. Sound Explorer Experiment with professional audio effects including reverb, echo, and distortion. Select from curated sound packs to discover unique sonic textures. Music Journey Track your progress with detailed statistics. Unlock achievements as you play notes, create compositions, and master different instruments. Learning Features:
- Real-time audio synthesis for authentic instrument sounds
- Visual feedback for improved learning
- Progress tracking and achievement system
- Adaptive difficulty for rhythm challenges
- Intuitive interface designed for all skill levels

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!
